unnormalised: Automotive Alert: Delhi Traffic Gets a Revamp!
normalised: Automotive Alert: Delhi Traffic Gets a Revamp!

unnormalised: Guess what, Delhiites? Traffic regulations are getting a major overhaul! Dr. Sharma from IIT-Delhi just announced some big changes aimed at easing congestion. Apparently, the Ring Road is becoming a no-parking zone, like, seriously. Anyone caught will face hefty fines – rumors say upwards of Rs. 5000!
normalised: Guess what, Delhiites? Traffic regulations are getting a major overhaul! Doctor Sharma from I I T-Delhi just announced some big changes aimed at easing congestion. Apparently, the Ring Road is becoming a no-parking zone, like, seriously. Anyone caught will face hefty fines – rumors say upwards of rupee five thousand!

unnormalised: They're also implementing a new lane system on the Gurgaon Expressway. Think 'left for Delhi, right for Jaipur' kinda simple. Plus, automated challans are going to be even more widespread, so buckle up and keep your documents handy!
normalised: They're also implementing a new lane system on the Gurgaon Expressway. Think 'left for Delhi, right for Jaipur' kinda simple. Plus, automated challans are going to be even more widespread, so buckle up and keep your documents handy!

unnormalised: And for all you two-wheeler riders, helmet cameras are now officially legal, but only if they don't obstruct your view. Good news for those of us who want to document the crazy traffic, eh?
normalised: And for all you two-wheeler riders, helmet cameras are now officially legal, but only if they don't obstruct your view. Good news for those of us who want to document the crazy traffic, eh?

unnormalised: Finally, plans are in the works to expand parking spaces by a whopping 10,000 sq ft near Connaught Place. Let's hope this solves the parking nightmare once and for all! It's all about making our daily commute a little less "OMG!" and a little more "Namaste." Drive safe, folks!
normalised: Finally, plans are in the works to expand parking spaces by a whopping ten thousand square feet near Connaught Place. Let's hope this solves the parking nightmare once and for all! It's all about making our daily commute a little less "Oh My Gosh!" and a little more "Namaste." Drive safe, folks!
